headline: Everest Appoints Pamela Sinclair as Executive Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, June 25, 2025--Everest Group, Ltd. (NYSE: EG), a global underwriting leader providing best-in-class property, casualty, and specialty reinsurance and insurance solutions, announced that Pamela Sinclair will join Everest as EVP, Chief Human Resources Officer, effective July 14. Ms. Sinclair will report to Jim Williamson, Everest President and CEO, and will serve on the Company’s Executive Leadership Team.
